attributes.action: Ensure that the Character, Sustainability and Identity of Villages and Towns in the South East of England are maintained by separating them from each other with a sufficent amount of Greenbelt land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New houses need to be built and first time buyers need more opportunities to get on the housing ladder. However this must be done in a controlled manner to ensure that the character, sustainability, and identity of villages and towns in the South East of England are maintained by separating them from each other with a sufficent amount of greenbelt land. Urban sprawl would break down our communities, reduce our standard of living, increase crime and make our country less attractive to visitors from other countries.
